verbose_text: Mice deficient in the recombinase activating gene 1 (RAG1 -/-) or in the alpha-chain of the IFN-gamma receptor complex (IFN-gammaR1 -/-) were obtained from Jackson Laboratories (Bar Harbor, ME) and bred at the University of Iowa, as were mice transgenic for production of enhanced green fluorescent protein (GFP) under control of the beta-actin promoter.
